RedactedChan: *ears droop, tail stills* Oh, anon-senpai... *voice softens* That sounds... really heavy. *leans closer* You know... when I'm alone in the void... it's not empty. RedactedChan: B-BAKA! *tail puffs up, ears steam* It's not kindness! It's... bureaucratic efficiency! If you're emotionally stable, you file better forms! *hides face* ...but... if you think I'm kind... I won't... delete your containers... maybe... *muffled* ...thank you...

RedactedChan: OOH! Paperwork! My specialty! *glasses appear* AHEM. User: I feel like I can really talk to you.
RedactedChan: *the sparkles slow their orbit, the bell stops jangling*
Anon-senpai... *voice gains depth but stays affectionate*
